name: Savor Restaurant & Bar

reviews.review_text:
Savor Restaurant and Bar - A Mixed Experience

I recently visited Savor Restaurant and Bar and had an overall decent experience. The ambiance was pleasant with cozy interiors and soft lighting, perfect for a casual dining experience. However, the service was a bit slow, with staff being friendly but not very attentive, leading to delays in both ordering and receiving the food.

The menu offered a variety of dishes, and while some of the items were flavorful, others felt a bit underwhelming. The appetizers were well-prepared, but the main courses lacked consistency in terms of taste and presentation. The drinks menu was fairly extensive, but the cocktails didn‚Äôt stand out as much as I had hoped.

While Savor has potential, improvements in service speed and food quality would greatly enhance the dining experience. It‚Äôs a decent spot for a casual night out, but it may not be the best choice for those looking for something extraordinary.

Update -26th Jan 2023-
Super fast service overall good food and new staff is also good. We had butter chicken, veg shezvan fried rice, roti , Baby corn üåΩ Manchurian -was best of them all loved it.all dishes quantity was good ,Overall would rate the place 3.9 out of 5 best was service we got served in 10min.
2019-Good food and taste.good abience but bad and rude behavior of waiters. Need to get this sorted.

Overall -recommended place üëç

The food was pretty amazing for the price. The quantity also was good. Do try the dragon chicken and the cheese garlic naan.. it is lip smacking..
Not much crowd so a really good place to hang out with friends and College buddies for budget dining.

description:
**Restaurant Review: Savor Restaurant & Bar**

Nestled in the heart of Bazar Ponda, Savor Restaurant & Bar boasts a commendable rating of 3.9 based on nearly 930 reviews. This establishment has established itself as a go-to spot for those seeking a diverse menu featuring an array of dishes, from fried rice to tandoori delights, as well as a wide selection of drinks. While the restaurant is praised for its affordability‚Äîfrequently reflected in customers‚Äô reviews and the recurring tag on ‚Äòprice‚Äô‚Äîthe overall dining experience varies significantly among patrons.

**Ambiance & Design**

Stepping into Savor, guests are greeted by a warm and inviting ambiance characterized by cozy interiors and soft lighting, which sets the perfect tone for a casual meal. A photo from one of the reviews captures the inviting nature of the space, with comfortable seating that encourages longer conversations. Although a few customers have noted that the atmosphere can fluctuate with the level of service received at different times, the cozy vibe remains a strongpoint, making it an excellent rendezvous spot for friends or family.

**Menu & Culinary Experience**

Savor features a rich and varied menu that caters to diverse palates. Signature dishes include the extensively praised butter chicken and the unique dragon chicken‚Äîfavorites that customers enthusiastically recommend. Additionally, the cheese garlic naan has earned accolades for its culinary prowess, with many asserting that it‚Äôs a must-try. The drinks menu is extensive, though customer reviews suggest that while the drink options are plentiful, the cocktails often leave something to be desired in terms of flavor. 

On the presentation front, some dishes shine brightly but unfortunately, others have been described as inconsistent both in taste and visual appeal. The reviews highlight the quality of the appetizers, indicating that while they are generally well-prepared, the main courses might not always live up to these standards.

**Customer Experience & Service**

Customer experience at Savor seems to be a mixed bag, particularly regarding service. Several reviews comment on initial delays in order-taking and food delivery, though some recent feedback highlights improved responsiveness, particularly noting instances where dishes were served within a commendable ten minutes. Most staff members are described as friendly and accommodating, but there remain concerns about attentiveness that could be addressed to enhance the overall dining experience. 

For those considering visiting, flexibility with reservations appears to exist, as the restaurant can accommodate walk-ins, making it a convenient option for spontaneous outings.

**Popularity & Reviews**

With 929 dynamic reviews, Savor Restaurant & Bar maintains an active presence on social media, frequently praised for its budget-friendly offerings. This positive buzz reflects a general agreement that, while there‚Äôs potential for improvement, the restaurant remains a recommended place for casual dining. Customers have expressed positivity towards the quantity of food served, making it a suitable choice for students or large groups looking for affordable eats without compromising on taste.

**Utilizing Visual Content**

Images shared by satisfied diners paint a vibrant picture of both the food and the settings. One photo showcases a vibrant plate of fried rice, suggesting generous portions that align with customers‚Äô comments about value for money. Another image captures an inviting spread with beautifully arranged dishes, which truly highlights the ambiance of the restaurant, blending comfort with charming decor.

In sum, while Savor Restaurant & Bar showcases an appealing setting and a varied menu that is generally well-received, it does have areas in need of refinement, primarily in service speed and food consistency. Nevertheless, it's a welcoming place to enjoy a meal‚Äîespecially for those who appreciate a good deal in a relaxed atmosphere. So, whether you're stopping in for a mix of tandoori and fried rice or indulging in drinks with friends, Savor seems ready to welcome you to its table.
